title.rendered: Barun Rai and the House on the Cliff

content.rendered:
Directed by Sam Bhattacharjee

Written by Sara Bodinar. Sudhanshu Dube. Mitch Wicking

Star Priyanshu Chatterjee (Barun). Nyra Banerjee (Soumili). Sid Makkar (Harmesh). George Dawson (Brian). Shawn Dixon (Police Officer). Tony Richardson (Father Paul). Aakash Shukal (Sukhbir). Ayvianna Snow (Polly). Adam Day (Reporter). Mirabel Stuart (Camilla). Emma Galliano (Inspector Jenny Jones). Judy Kriz ((voice)). Chandini Wilson (Harmesh’s Mother). Duncan Padfield (VILLAGER). Anne Padfield (VILLAGER). Rachel Bryan (GIRL ON THE HORSE). Francesca Marie Williams (AMERICAN HOUSE GHOST). David Paul Perlmutter (POLICE OFFICER (FOREST)). Crispin Jamie (REPORTER 1). Andrew Perry (DOCTOR (THERAPIST)). Aaron Beha (DOCTOR (THERAPIST)). Dave Watts (SHOP WORKER). Pierce Tomlinson (VILLAGER). Jamie Ellis (GUITAR PLAYER). Billy Totham (YOUNG PRIEST). Kathi DeCouto (COUNCIL WORKER). Jared Gerschwitz (COUNCIL WORKER). Juliet Burr (COUNCIL WORKER). Kirsty Sawyer (JOURNALIST / AMERICAN LADY). Lenore Fiorenbcelli (JOURNALIST / AMERICAN LADY). Lorena Ximena (JOURNALIST / AMERICAN LADY). Swaylee Loughnane (Police officer (forest)). Travis Booth-Millard (Alexander)

Language English. Hindi

Producers Tamanna Ali. Sam Bhattacharjee. Mitra Bhattacharya. Suraj Chauhan. Mahbub Reza Chowdhury. Nimish Doshi. Firuzi Khan

Production Unicorn Motion Pictures
